compilation_methodology.approach: Cultural immersion with academic validation and native speaker consultation
quality_control: Native speaker verification of cultural context
Academic literature cross-reference for linguistic accuracy

primary_cultural_values: Wa (和) - Group harmony and social cohesion
Hierarchy and respect for social order (senpai/kohai)

usage_guidelines.intended_use: Content moderation with deep cultural awareness for Japanese audiences
cultural_sensitivity_requirements: Account for age and generational differences
Consider regional variations (Tokyo vs. Kansai vs. rural)
limitations: Business vs. casual context dramatic differences

cultural_respect: Respect traditional values while acknowledging evolution
implementation_ethics: Balance cultural sensitivity with practical filtering
Provide educational context rather than just blocking
Consider impact on Japanese language learners

special_features.multi_script_support: Full support for all Japanese writing systems with cross-reference
special_features.romanization_recognition: Multiple romanization systems and common misspelling patterns
special_features.cultural_context_integration: Deep cultural context for appropriate severity assessment
special_features.internet_culture_tracking: Recognition of evolving online community language
special_features.regional_variations: Tokyo, Kansai, and rural variation recognition

legal_compliance.hate_speech_laws: Compliance with Japanese hate speech and discrimination laws
legal_compliance.harassment_prevention: Workplace and educational harassment prevention support
legal_compliance.platform_compliance: Support for Japanese social media and gaming platform policies
